title: Is there anyone who can suggest topic related renewable energy for term paper? - Quora

response.answer_text: Design of Hybrid Renewable Power System, a power plant that seamlessly combines PV, wind, biomass and storage(optional), in order to form a system that is always available, provides a stable power output at all times. And doesn't have the intermittency issue generally associated with solar and wind. Modern power electronics, control circuits and predictive modelling can make the system intelligent, it should be able to adapt to a variety of load requirements. Just an idea, you can improve upon it as you see fit.

Im not sure what your brief will include, however, a really great topic project I have looked at is the severn barrage.   It is basically a term used for the collection of ideas toward building a massive hydroelectric power dam that could supply up to fifteen % of the national grid of the UK. It's just an idea which could really become expanded on and may be a major construction in the next fifty or so years.

Compare the energy resource to mechanical of electric conversion efficiency of different proposed renewable energy ideas and relate it to the temperature, height difference or other measure of the availability of the resource and then connect this to the capital investment cost of each form.

This article is about how to use some physical forces as a source of renewable energy https://www.researchgate.net/publication/298045558_Method_for_converting_gravity_force_spring_force_and_force_of_permanent_magnets_in_a_rotary_motion
